name: hello junaid
heading: Complete Health Solution
heading-info: Consulting a healthcare professional, buying medicine, ordering lab tests and improving your health and wellbeing, all can be done 24/7 with DocTime!

facility.name: Live Video Consultation
facility.info: Instant video consultation now or schedule a future appointment

facility.name: Diagnostic at your doorstep
facility.info: Get tested in few hours at home & get report in the app within 24 hours.

facility.name: Order Medicine Online
facility.info: Order easily and get the medicine in 1 hour

faculty.name: Physician Medicine / General Physician
faculty.info: Cold, flu, fever, vomiting, infections, headaches or any other general health issues.

faculty.name: Pediatrics Child Care / Pediatrics
faculty.info: Any children's health related issues including physical, behavior and mental health.

faculty.name: Psychiatry
faculty.info: Diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of mental disorders related to mood, behaviour, cognition, and perceptions.

faculty.name: Nutrition & Food Science
faculty.info: Weight management, Health & wellness, Overall well being.

faculty.name: Brain / Neurology
faculty.info: Diagnosis, treatment for disease involving the central and peripheral nervous systems.

faculty.name: Internal Medicine
faculty.info: Prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of adults across the spectrum from health to complex illness.

faculty.name: Diabetes / Endocrinology
faculty.info: Treatment of diseases related to problems with hormone.

faculty.name: Dental Care / Dentistry
faculty.info: Diagnosis, management, and treatment of defects and injuries related to the teeth and gums.

faculty.name: Urology
faculty.info: Diagnosis and treatment of diseases of the male and female urinary-tract system.

faculty.name: Cancer / Oncology
faculty.info: Oncology is a branch of medicine that deals with the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of cancer
